Note: Participant is looking at MR display with black dashboard
Participant says they normally experience car sickness only when reading
Participant notices that screen clarity is reduced as some colors appear different than what they actually look like (orange and brown are difficult to tell apart, for instance)
Participant’s focus is primarily in the screen and says they are not necessarily paying attention to the road and what’s happening in front of them
Participant is peering down toward black dashboard and states that looking anywhere else makes the screen incredibly hard to see, describing it as a “ghost”
Participant feels that they concentrate less when watching reels on MR display vs phone
Participant notices that glasses tend to continually slip off and feel heavy on nose
Participant feels like they’re looking down too much and believes that the display sits too low within the glasses
